titleInfo.title: Ground breaking for the Parkway Campus

mods.abstract: The drive to build a new campus for Chirstian Brothers College began in 1939 under the co-chairmanship of Leslie M. Stratton, Sr., Edward F. Barry, and Edmund Orgill.
